triangle



Triangle2f

typedef struct {
  vec2f a;
  vec2f b;
  vec2f c;
} Triangle2f;
type: C struct
description: 2d triangle float

Triangle2d

typedef struct {
  vec2d a;
  vec2d b;
  vec2d c;
} Triangle2d;
type: C struct
description: 2d triangle double

Trianglef

typedef struct {
  vec3f a;
  vec3f b;
  vec3f c;
} Trianglef;
type: C struct
description: 3d triangle float

Triangled

typedef struct {
  vec3d a;
  vec3d b;
  vec3d c;
} Triangled;
type: C struct
description: 2d triangle double
